name: Serjeant
description: You didn’t start your career piloting mechs- you were a ground-pounder first, and you know all the ins and outs of mech/infantry cooperation. You’ve been assigned, or have gathered to you, a small but loyal team of infantry, who will fight alongside you and underfoot, come hell or high water.

ranks.name: The Wild Bunch
ranks.description: In combat, you are always accompanied by a single Squad of 10 soldiers. They use the stats for Tier 1 Squads, save that they have 5 HP, Speed 3, and will immediately retreat from combat if it is reduced to 0. The squad always begins combat on a free space adjacent to your Mech, and take their turn immediately after yours in the turn order.

ranks.name: Band of Brothers
ranks.description: Your squad now has 10 HP and Speed 4.

ranks.name: Platoon
ranks.description: Your squad will not retreat from battle unless you order them to, and they benefit from one  optional Squad Trait of your choice, chosen at the start of each mission.
